snippet: The bride teaches first grade at the Chapin School in New York; the bridegroom is an associate at Acadia Realty Trust in White Plains.
lead_paragraph: Rebecca Brody Harvis, the daughter of Natalie D. McCabe of New York and Steven J. Harvis of Briarcliff Manor, N.Y., was married Saturday to Jeffrey Adam Kohn, the son of Carol E. Kohn and Dr. Marvin A. Kohn of West Palm Beach, Fla. Cantor Norman Brody officiated at the Breakers Hotel in Palm Beach, Fla. Mrs. Kohn, 28, teaches first grade at the Chapin School, a private girls' school in New York. She graduated from Boston University and received a master's in education from Fordham University.
